item.title: Sensex and Nifty Advance as Metal Sector Leads Gains; Jupiter Wagons Tops BSE500
item.description: The Indian equity markets witnessed broad-based gains on 22 December 2025, with the Sensex climbing 468.33 points to trade at 85,397.69, reflecting a 0.55% rise. The Nifty followed suit, supported by strong sectoral performance, particularly in metals, while small caps led the market advance. Jupiter Wagons emerged as the top gainer among BSE500 stocks, underscoring selective buying interest amid positive global cues and steady foreign institutional investor activity. Time: 7 minutes ago
